每日花半小時綀習英文:
Readings:
China’s digital economy: A leading global force
http://www.mckinsey.com/global-themes/china/chinas-digital-economy-a-leading-global-force?cid=other-eml-alt-mgi-mgi-oth-1708&hlkid=751b73b9a9674e89a9790d85e75d240e&hctky=10017555&hdpid=e31341e3-14e7-43da-a2b7-9a6011f5c12e

Insights:
- China is the largest e-commerce market and it has also become a major global force in mobile payments

- Types of digital technology: VR, AI, Autonomous vehicles, 3D printing, robotics, drones (n. 無人駕駛飛機/遙控飛機)

- The sheer scale (phr. 龐大的規模)of China’s Internet user-base encourages continuous experimentation and enables digital players to achieve economies of scale quickly. 

- Baidu, Alibaba, and Tencent, collectively known as BAT

- The BAT companies have been developing a multifaceted and multi-industry digital ecosystem that touches almost every aspect of consumers’ lives.

- The government gave digital players space to experiment before enacting official regulation and is now becoming an active supporter. 

- * In combination, these three factors mean that China has an increasingly visible presence on the global stage and rising impact on the global economy. 

-  China’s digital globalization is only just getting started but is gathering momentum.

- how three types of digital disruption—de-materialization, dis-intermediation and disaggregation—can help to restructure value chains, and increase the speed of the disruption.
 Dematerialization = the reduction in the quantity of materials required to serve economic functions (doing more with less).
 Disintermediation = giving the user or the consumer direct access to information that otherwise would require a mediator, such as a salesperson, a librarian, or a lawyer. 
 Disaggregation = Breaking up of a total (aggregate), integrated whole, or a conglomerate, into smaller elements, parts, or units, usually for easier handling or management. (e.g., buying rather than making components, outsourcing sales or distribution)

Vocabulary / Sentence (patterns):
1. drones (n. 無人駕駛飛機/遙控飛機)
2. sheer scale (phr. 龐大的規模)of sth (e.g. investment, people)
3. Company A developed sth that touches almost every aspect of consumers’ lives.
4. _____ has an increasingly visible presence on the global stage
5. ___ is only just getting started but is gathering momentum
(gathering momentum = to become gradually stronger or more successful)

Donovan Livingston's Harvard Graduate School of Education Student Speech 2016
[url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lwq37jnJoNo&t=92s
[/url]
[url]http://www.gse.harvard.edu/news/16/05/lift
[/url](speech script)

Vocabulary / Sentence (patterns):

Education then, beyond all other devices of human origin,
Is a great equalizer of the conditions of men.
教育，遠勝於其它人類起源的一切工具，是一個極佳的人與人之間不同條件，境況的平衡器。

1. In this order of operations — a heinous miscalculation of reality.
Heinous: adj. 令人髮指/可憎的/極兇惡的

2. 唔明呢一句點解,求教: How many times must we be made to feel like quotas — Like tokens in coined phrases? “Diversity. Inclusion”

3. A lonely blossom(=flower) in a briar patch(布满荆棘的路) of broken promises.

4. But I’ve always been a thorn (=此釋眼中钉) in the side of injustice. 但我一直都是不公義的眼中钉。(反對不公義)

5. With veins pumping revolution. (與靜脈注入革命)
* with veins pumping sth

6. I am a DREAM Act, Dream Deferred incarnate.
Incarnate (adjective [ after noun])= 化身
e.g. One survivor described his torturers as devils incarnate. 一名生還者形容拷打他的那些人是魔鬼的化身。

7. I am a movement – an amalgam of memories America would care to forget
an amalgam of (a combination/mixture of)

8. Unencumbered by the lumbering weight of poverty and privilege
unencumbered = adj. 沒有阻礙的;沒有負擔的;不受妨礙的
encumber = vt. 阻塞；妨害；拖累
e.g. You shouldn’t let those heavy books encumber you. 你不該讓這些沉重的書阻礙你學習。

9. She gave me a stage. A platform.
She told me that our stories are ladders
That make it easier for us to touch the stars.

10. Light up the world with your luminous allure.
Allure = N-UNCOUNT The allure of something or someone is the pleasing or exciting quality that they have. 魅力
e.g. The allure and charm of Paris captivate all who visit there. 

11. Today, when I look my students in the eyes, all I see are constellations.
Constellations =星座

12. We were born to be comets (=彗星)

13. lift off（火箭等）發射;（直升飛機）起飛

習慣形成初期最好調低目標，最好唔好比起你日常有太大改變，因為要建立新既neuron path要習慣新既synapse,所以愈容易做愈易養成習慣。 加油ching。

[url]http://www.aastocks.com/tc/stocks/news/comment.aspx?id=17619
[/url]恒指四周連陽，業績仍是主導

港股從今年開始表現非常強勁，不但錄得連續7個月漲幅，更是在上周嘗試突破27600一線，業績表現為大市提供支撐。

投資者焦點基本在幾大藍籌股上，包括匯控（00005.HK）、騰訊（00700.HK）和友邦（01299.HK）等，不過在他們在上周陸續出現回調。恒指在上週三曾高見27747.35創26個月新高，不過逢高沽空的壓力進一步顯現，成交也從千億水平回落，上週五收在27562.68，不過仍錄得四周連陽累升8.8%，畢竟短期內累積不少升幅，調整並不完全是壞事，目前技術指標依舊向好，指數維持在上行趨勢中，回調幅度料有限。新的一周諸多業績將公佈，包括中電（00002.HK）、港交所（00388.HK）和中移動（00941.HK）等，都需要特別關注，看能否成為大市動能，助其挑戰兩萬八。

美股繼續上漲，非農超預期，帶動道指連續第八日創新高，美債上漲，金價回落,美匯指數升0.76%至93.542，留意會否影響港股走勢。內地股市相對偏弱，滬指雖然周線連收7陽，但乏力突破3300點，關注一批重要經濟數據公佈，包括進出口、CPI和PPI等。


[url]http://www.aastocks.com/tc/cnhk/commentary/comment.aspx?id=17621
[/url]軍工板塊強勢崛起，整理格局延續
上週五大市維持高位震盪整理格局，滬深兩市早盤走勢輕微分化，滬指小幅震盪上行，而深市則較為疲軟。午後初段兩市轉為橫盤，但收市前大市出現跳水情況，最終兩市雙雙收跌。截至收市，上證指數報3,262.08點，下跌10.85點，跌幅0.33%，成交2,856億元；深證成指報10,361.23點，下跌74.94點，跌幅0.72%，成交2,813億元；創業板指報1,719.62點，下跌13.50點，跌幅0.78%，成交586億元。

盤面上，前期跌幅較大的航空航太、船舶製造兩大軍工板塊領漲，板塊內出現漲停潮，中航高科（600862.SH）、中航電子(600879.SH)、中航黑豹(600760.SH)等多隻個股強勢漲停。另一邊，保險、有色、裝修材料、煤炭和港口等前期漲幅較大板塊集體出現調整跡象，大盤板塊輪動行情再現。漲價概念全線熄火，漲價龍頭方大炭素（600516.SH）股價上演過山車，由早盤最高漲近9%，到尾盤收市跌逾7%，短線漲價概念股下行風險大幅上升，建議獲利較大品種逢高獲利後輕倉觀望為好。消息面上，發改委、農業部共同組織篩選了農業領域第一批PPP試點項目，加強對PPP試點項目扶持，通過前期費用獎補、政府補助、貸款貼息等形式，支持項目實施。2017年PPP項目在一系列政策引導下加速落地，但下半年以來相關板塊活躍度較低，此外農業供給側改革也是投資主線之一，建議提前埋伏較高安全邊際的相關個股。

大盤小幅沖高回落，表明上方套牢盤和高位獲利盤拋壓尚未完全釋放，多方需要積蓄更多力量才能有效突破3,300點。目前中印雙方對峙為大盤埋下了隱患，導致資金表現較為謹慎，軍工板塊大漲導致前期熱點板塊失血回落，板塊之間未能形成合力，建議輕倉為主。
加油
今日好累
